pr_title: Support packing instructions for invoice line 'Batch entry'

timeline.message:
Support packing instructions for invoice line 'Batch entry'
https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6201

timeline.bodyText:
Adding this method is fine, but now we have two ways of creating an instance and devs won't know which one to take.
So, suggestion: clean up the InvoiceLineHUPackingAware constructor:

make it private
remove the super() (compiler will add it to the bytecode for you ;-) )
remove the Check.assumeNotNull and instead annotate the parameter with lombok @NonNull
timeline.author: metas-ts
